The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--021abf342d371248e50ceaed478a90ca-->
### Reviews
See [the guideline](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#code-review) for information on the review process.
A summary of reviews will appear here.
<!--5faf32d7da4f0f540f40219e4f7537a3-->
### LLM Linter (✨ experimental)

Possible typos and grammar issues:

- ellision -> elision [spelling of "elision" in comment]
- other wise -> otherwise [incorrect split of the word "otherwise"]

<sup>drahtbot_id_5_m</sup>

events.body: added "trivial challenge" support per signet implementation.
handle long challenges with proper elision and text flow.
common length challenges elide and flow correctly.

comments.body: Might be a better way to elide the middle so that a copy/paste gets the full string?
Testing a proper Qt interface for better formatting now.
move ChallengeToStdString to src/util/strencodings.cpp for later availability in main window.
